summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of that portion of the N 1/2 of the NW 1/4 of the NE 1/4 of Section 3-23-4, lying 150 feet east of Empire Way, being a strip of land 150 feet deep, extending along the east side of Empire Way from Roxbury Street to a line 624 feet south of and parallel to Roxbury Street; with respect to Use Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by addding thereto one new section numbered 2-348.
